summary: The module defines a GraphAPI class that offers a highâ€‘level interface for constructing, inspecting, and analyzing Conan dependency graphs. It handles loading of different recipe types, scopes package options, and runs binary compatibility analysis on the resolved graph.
business_intent: To provide programmatic capabilities for building and evaluating Conan package dependency graphs, enabling tools and users to resolve recipes, manage options, and assess binary compatibility across build and host contexts.
